nodes.documentation:
@author Nikola Madjarevic
 Contract which will represent campaign for the fungible assets
nodes.name: TwoKeyAcquisitionCampaignERC20

nodes.documentation: @notice Event which will be emitted when conversion expire
nodes.name: Expired

nodes.documentation: @notice Event which will be emitted when fallback function is executed
nodes.name: ReceivedEther

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function to add asset contract of specific ERC20
 @param _assetContract of that asset Contract
nodes.name: addAssetContractERC20

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier which is going to check if current time is between opening-closing campaign time
nodes.name: isOngoing

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier which is going to check if campaign is closed (if time is greater then closing time)
nodes.name: isClosed

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to check is the influencer eligible for participation in campaign
nodes.name: isWhiteListedInfluencer

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to check is the converter eligible for participation in conversion
nodes.name: isWhitelistedConverter

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to check if the Converter did the conversion
nodes.name: didConverterConvert
addFungibleAsset
checkInventoryBalance

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function which will check the balance and automatically update the balance in our contract regarding balance response
 @return balance of ERC20 we have in our contract
nodes.name: checkAndUpdateInventoryBalance
moveFungibleAsset
transferFungibleAsset

nodes.documentation:
I wanna pay for something with TwoKey tokens
 Amount should be the amount of twokey tokens
 tokenID -> assetName
 Acquisition campaign is campaign which is selling something which can be bought with 2key or ETH
nodes.name: fulfillFungibleTwoKeyToken
calculateModeratorFee
checkAmountAddressSent

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function to check contract balance of specified ERC20 tokens
 @return balance
nodes.name: getContractBalance

nodes.documentation:
@notice View function to fetch the address of asset contract
 @return address of that asset contract
nodes.name: getAssetContractAddress
